name: BOSS HOG: LIVIN' LIFE ON THE EDGE
name_original: BOSS HOG: LIVIN' LIFE ON THE EDGE
description:
Boss Hog is a barnyard-themed top-down bullet-hell game.

You play as the Boss Hog, a pig with not are care in the world, living life on the edge. When suddenly you've cruised your way into cow territory.  They want nothing more than to see your downfall as the Hog Boss. Unfortunate for them, you've brought along your trusty weapons which double up as delicious treats. Fruits and veggies! Shoot the hoard of cows down and show them why you're deserving of the Hog Boss title.

P.S. In the 19th Century cows were referred to as bosses.

~Controls~

Movement: W, A, S, D

Shoot: Arrow keys
